resources.string: 2. These rooms will be from a fixed viewpoint, so it will not change based on player position.
1. You will control a player character and navigate through dungeon rooms with different layouts and enemies.
3. You will be able to attack and destroy enemies, collect powerups, and reach exits that take you to the next room.
6. The player will be able to earn a high score on a leaderboard displayed at the end of the game.
5. To win, the player must reach the exit of every room.
4. The enemies will be able to attack the player and the player will lose health, and if they run out of health, the game is over.
